Package cbccore.movement Description

A plug-in based movement library for navigating yourself around the board, with little more code than simply:
driveTrainObject.moveCm(5., driveTrainObject.getMaxCmps() * .5);

After you write your program, it can be used interchangeably on a create, with a simple lego base, or with whatever other device you wish, given that you create your own plug-in by providing minimal API translation.

The package also offers basic position tracking, and will eventually support pathfinding via an advanced geometrical algorithm.
